title: Colombo during curfew...
body_lines: The Colombo City looks calm and the streets are deserted as island-wide curfew was clamped down yesterday until 7.00 am on Wednesday. Six people have been reported died and nearly 200 injured. The nation plunged into chaos after a group of government supporters attacked the peaceful protesters opposite Temple Trees and at Galle Face on Monday. Pix by Pradeep Pathirana
